name: Chasing Shadows
description:
The shadows took her... they're killing her, minute by minute... I need to keep her alive.

Game by Andrzej Gieralt and Stephen Bahadur made for Ludum Dare 46. NOTE: Use downloaded version for best experience due to some of the controls not working well with the browser (might quit the page for example).

===CONTROLS===

WASD to move

Left CTRL to sneak

E to interact with terminals

SHIFT to dash
